channel.title: Poetry on the willy weave
channel.description: Recent content in Poetry on the willy weave

item.title: closure
item.description: healing, growing, changing for the better when mirrors don’t reflect all that we are is it our fault? where did we go wrong? skimming on the reflections focusing on the imperfections in a world full of mistakes and rawness -aw

item.title: a friend
item.description: a hearty laugh and a pint glass full we often forget how simple it can be the pleasure we seek so far and wide can be found right next to ye -aw

item.title: one day
item.description: one day I’ll be that way one day I’ll get there one day I’ll do that thing one day I’ll understand one day creating our own futures only to breed inevitable anxieties about them yet we are forever rooted in the present -aw

item.title: devisive
item.description: our instinct is to connect, grow and flourish be with one another, help one another through trials and tribulations yet we’re divided, besmirched and erased like a line of writing, or a harnessed thing but we remain the power, just divided -aw

item.title: wasting away
item.description: this existence is treacherous we bind and we breed becoming anew and making waves and yet each passing day feels like a curse just time to be filled -aw

item.title: pieces of me
item.description: day by day night after night someone to love someone to share with pieces are scattered everywhere for what’s in your memory of me when I’m gone or unseen with nothing left not even a fragrance how am I memorized if at all -aw

item.title: shells of us
item.description: a shell of what I once was a seedling of what I’ve only started to become the only constant here is change like water, we need movement stay stagnant, and we’ll stew and swamp -aw

item.title: everything is a mirror
item.description: this thing in you i may not like is a thing in me i may not like little acts of reflection stowed away, hidden in plain sight we’re so simple yet we’ve strayed from love and light -aw

item.title: self reflections
item.description: the shadows hold my secrets but do they keep them? without much luck tend to find myself avoiding I lean into the care, yet I find myself pulling away -aw

item.title: golden waves
item.description: a string of notes the rasp of an acoustic the flicker of a smile and laugh on the other side a heart melts, begets and begets connected in ways beyond the obvious -aw

item.title: crying
item.description: how mixed up we’ve become laughing until we cry and crying until we laugh the duality is real but the feelings? -aw

item.title: meet me in viridian city
item.description: a kid that has never quite grown pixels upon pixels dreams being dreams, little else to do a d-pad and a box of legos take me back, just for a day let the bliss be bliss -aw

item.title: wallflower boy
item.description: a double, triple entendre flowers grow where flowers may eyes linger and eyes flutter where it grows is where it stays only natural things where it ought it to be is where it will stay -aw

item.title: a transient state of mind
item.description: to do or not to do the leathery scratch that being a medium brings nothing is ever black and white cut and dry words upon a page are the closest -aw

item.title: touch
item.description: to be held it was once said could heal a human be held, and be still -aw

item.title: false pretenses
item.description: no outcomes should be the outlook detaching from a possible future still maintaining connection yet disconnecting from those false pretenses -aw

item.title: shadows of work
item.description: the places where contradictions live corners of a mind where you don’t dare to look dust off the cobwebs, make it count these are the places where we make it count making the worst of us, into the better for us we all have our shadows of work -aw

item.title: a quiet place
item.description: find that place that calls you a mindset, a future you adore all wrapped up within an experience -aw

item.title: gripping realities
item.description: a dark night awakens chokes me with it’s shadowy figures dimmed lights and quiet notes a chest heavy with worries unknown chilled and stunned all the same deep breath in, hold, deep breath out -aw

item.title: the sand and dust
item.description: the wind is course public discourse over livlihoods and plans within plans gritting, biting the words sting like a thousand cuts let us have peace -aw

item.title: land o land
item.description: we are nature and nature is us returning to your roots is simply returning to yourself connecting with the deeper self releasing inhibitions constructed by a new reality -aw

item.title: sweet child
item.description: sweet child for what future did we pave you had no hope to begin with but cherish what you can and spread love while you can for this life is truly short -aw

item.title: whole
item.description: I’m here, I’m whole so why do I feel so bro ken -aw

item.title: we're a lot a alike you know
item.description: we’re a lot alike you know thinking, thinking about thinking that little voice in your head that reads these words off the screen yet everything we know, we must detach from the “I” must detach from itself subatomic metacognition, thinking about thinking about thinking and then, bliss, oneness, infinity -aw

item.title: an age of entropy
item.description: in an age where everything is numbed desenstization has reached peak control the entropy of human consciousness is low the only dials being turned are the ones of fear, hate, divisiveness when resources are low, fear is the driving force -aw

item.title: chemicals altering chemicals
item.description: a pill for the pain you feel another for the pain you might feel another for the past pain you felt when does it end? when we focus ourselves on the root, the core and not the symptoms themselves glorfying and mulling in numbness is not the way -aw

item.title: watch your footing
item.description: look around us at this world we’ve created the consumers being the consumer the ever viscious cycles of torment destroying of earthly practices and love may we return to our roots, find our footing -aw

item.title: products of products
item.description: take away everything I have everything you own things you hold, feel, touch what are you then? build upon that raw foundation someone who continues to strive the basis of who we are is not found in external things but within ourselves -aw

item.title: the wind at your back
item.description: give yourself the grace the strength to move persistence, energy, intention whatever held you back before no longer holds you you’re strong, you’re capable feel that wind at your back? that’s courage, friend not putting out your spark, but igniting it -aw

item.title: my world?
item.description: this is my world this is your world what do we make of this? is it yours? or mine? a shared collection of both together, we embrace, we strive, we grow like trees sharing the sunlight we grow alongside one another -aw

item.title: nothing and everything
item.description: nothing and everything both matter to rise up, seize a moment to fall back again and disintegrate we’re all parts of one whole of life let’s bring love, light and joy each day optional listening: Jacob & the Stone, by Emile Mosseri -aw

item.title: green fusion
item.description: being green, being blue what does it mean to you? the burdens we carry the emotions we stow away may you find the peace you need to better understand yourself and the world around you -aw

item.title: fractals
item.description: if you’re ever curious about the ways of nature simply look at the branches of a tree from bottom to top the dissecting and weaving of the branches like endless timelines marking their definite paths -aw

item.title: what am I to do
item.description: what am I to do holding all of these memories dear cherishing, relishing, capturing time holds no memories uncapsulated, they fleet only to be captured by us and let go by death alone -aw

item.title: winds of change
item.description: fluidity holds the universe’s secret atomic structures identically being the same yet form something that is always changing whether water or sand the formations and destructions are molded by this inevitable changing of tides -aw

item.title: the moderns
item.description: buy buy buy take take take have have have instead of cherish, appreciate, reconcile reset, repeat, reuse -aw

item.title: the little death
item.description: they can take my time but not my soul a heart yearning for creative output ideas that swarm nothing but my insides -aw

item.title: wars we attend to
item.description: each and every day we ride in the face of death opposing it at every turn so much time, but so little patience these are the modern wars we face the ones in our mind, the ones in plain sight -aw

item.title: controlled experiment
item.description: wave function collapse but unlike a dying star it’s a controlled commitment out of all potential futures I unequivocally choose you to be my reality -aw

item.title: timebender
item.description: let me bend timelines let me arrive at the destinations that my soul desires all possible states dance in my head I see the paths that lie ahead but allow me to choose the one my soul craves -aw

item.title: unmet conditions
item.description: a repeated loop retrying, collapsing, retrying always retrying until the initial condition is finally met getting better, closer little by little every moment -aw

item.title: the rot of life, pt. 2
item.description: here I sit here I wait time drones on inner workings on the universe converging at a very moments notice the energy, the timing all collapsing like a function mathematical blissfulness -aw

item.title: rotting away existence
item.description: here I rot here I wait life on the other side of these four walls so much to be grateful for but so much to miss this too shall pass like storm clouds rolling on by -aw

item.title: stay a while
item.description: what is the rush after all we only get so much time stay a while longer -aw

item.title: life is in presence
item.description: tell that person you like them enjoy the slowness of your day take a deep breath life is now, life is in presence -aw

item.title: dangerous nostalgia
item.description: longing for a past that no longer exists can lead to a future that only brings dismay -aw

item.title: decoration
item.description: paint scattered across a canvas decorating the essence of space let’s make music together decorating the essence of time -aw

item.title: many worlds
item.description: decisions upon decisions plans within plans within plans yet we squabble over the niceties zoom out, dig in what magic is surrounding us connect, recapture, care, love -aw

item.title: a hushed whisper
item.description: a whisper of the wind the cold press against the cheek one of mother earth’s many greetings accompanied by the most captivating sunset rays of golden flame framing the sky, sparking the hearts of onlookers -aw

item.title: a digital footprint
item.description: if my own eyes are the only ones to see this does it still exist? does it still make an impact? does it reach anything? does it’s energy ripple like waves in this vast unlimited exosphere? -aw

item.title: chaos
item.description: chaos and order are a lot more similar than we would expect for those who hold order cause the chaos and those who stoke chaos expect order -aw

item.title: a common good
item.description: a rush a rush we’re all in a hurry can talk for five minutes and then I have to scurry for what I don’t know there is so much calamity but why oh why it’s only myself that I pity -aw

item.title: branching of time
item.description: time is of the essence but what is this essence no future, nor past inextricably linked with space time is bound, branching, weaving look to the trees, for only they know -aw

item.title: mud to water
item.description: what is clean may become dirty and what is dirty may again become clean -aw

item.title: novelty of a thing
item.description: while pursuits are noble eventually the heart may fade a fleeting feeling the mundane is simply mundane new adventures peer over the horizon the novelty has been worn through -aw

item.title: what is
item.description: embrace what is and what was and what will be will fade away -aw

item.title: a creator
item.description: anyone can create possible iterations lie everywhere there are stories to be told for when the time is right a story doesn’t merely get created it is willed into existence -aw

item.title: emotional states
item.description: our states of being floating with us, and around us like clouds in the sky a fragrance that captivates and controls -aw

item.title: a note to a stranger
item.description: if you’re reading this friend just know that we are more connected than you will ever know divided by constructs or distance waves of particles and energy dance aglow soul to another soul, keep on going -aw

item.title: embued, embossed
item.description: we cannot lose our divets our hope, our failures our passion that ignites the things that make us, us be the divet, be the marker be the change, embrace the difference -aw

item.title: hopelessly optimistic
item.description: what is being romantic If not endlessly and hopelessly optimistic torturing ourselves with the pursuit of something bigger than we can even begin to comprehend -aw

item.title: give yourself the grace
item.description: give yourself grace for this is but the first time you are stumbling your way through this crazy life take your time, take it easy be gentle with yourself -aw

item.title: growing, slowly growing
item.description: day by day, moment by moment all learning, growing, climbing remember those moments from down below from whence you came let it serve as a reminder that had to win over the sole critic yourself -aw

item.title: true timing
item.description: words dance and wind rhymes that sparkling warm feeling arrived just in perfect time didn’t see it coming at first but the surest things in the universe tend to come in a burst -aw

item.title: galaxy glass
item.description: I want a wealth of you a galaxy in a glass the beautiful and divine like a shimmering glass of the purest wine -aw

item.title: demons dance together
item.description: the tangible feeling the rawness, the harsh past scratching clawing it’s way through your mind wounds become obsolete with the right person around introducing your demons to each other letting them dance together healing and harmonious darknesses intertwined creating light -aw

item.title: dive in
item.description: you know you are strong when you’re able to dive in head first knowing things may not last but also knowing were strong before and you’ll be strong forevermore -aw

item.title: hope among the despair
item.description: nature is our constant reminder that nothing is permanent ever changing, growing, morphing what one was, will never be again grains of sand, death and rebirth green to brown to green again may you know that even if it’s believed to be the end it is simply a new beginning -aw

item.title: in time, in time
item.description: blank pages stories unwritten things still to be said, and unsaid spaces to fill, gaps to close we are enough and everything, in time -aw

item.title: the renewal
item.description: who am I but a person a collection of thoughts, ideas, others a fragrance, an essence, a celestial thing a cosmic entity of organic matter who am I but a living thing, an organism existing -aw

item.title: dear capricorn
item.description: dear capricorn hardworking, trusty soul keep your wit close and your heart closer the end of the year is nigh so hold strong and hold fast for you’re in for a ride of a lifetime -aw

item.title: a natural chorus
item.description: let the leaves sing such a natural chorus the pitter patter of rain the world of nature reign -aw

item.title: conjured reality
item.description: biodigital jazz, he quips what age are we in in which reality have we conjured a space so limited yet unlimited -aw

item.title: the steam engine of life
item.description: a headache, a pain, a strain keep the steam train rolling until this fades away guided by mere thoughts as I treck down this unmarked path of life -aw

item.title: my child
item.description: my child you’ll be able to place your feelings know who they are and from whence they came they are not to be ashamed of but only to be appreciated cared for, admired, observed for they truly only serve you -aw

item.title: rampant
item.description: all by its lonesome, my mind runs rampant nothing but thoughts carry me away for each and every one of us has our own pitfalls, doubts, fears such as a cold front clears out the atmosphere a few utter words, mere breaths with variance are enough to make me forget make all the difference -aw

item.title: awakened
item.description: you awoke something within me something I felt existed but couldn’t quite unlock myself the gentle key that is you a bellows to a withering flame -aw

item.title: indecisiveness
item.description: for someone so indecisive you were the easiest choice not one second-guess you can be mine, be my mess -aw

item.title: terra
item.description: I’ll be the earth you nourish giving life, sharing life the essence of extraordinary a beauty defined by nature -aw

item.title: moments fleeting
item.description: all moments are fleeting good moments are captured whether by the mind or the soul some moments captured by both cherish them, protect them, hold them then just like that, let them be free -aw

item.title: occupado
item.description: occupy that space in my mind occupy that space in my heart make a little less room for everything else -aw

item.title: love is
item.description: love is just love the nonsensical thing we just do it doesn’t have to make sense to make sense it just is -aw

item.title: am I cooked?
item.description: if you have me questioning my extra “ha” at the end of a “haha” just know i’m cooked and you’ve captured my heart -aw

item.title: pageturner
item.description: be my favorite novella each day I hope to turn a new page and each day the next seems better than the last be my page turner captivating, illustrious may I never reach the end, though I know it’s inevitable -aw

item.title: bookworm
item.description: like starting a book halfway through, but still wanting to turn every page, to learn how you got to this point, and how you caught my attention. -aw

item.title: thoughts rambling
item.description: thoughts ramble like clouds in the sky, where I am takes no meaning. Purpose is bare and future grin, how we ought to be present and soak it all in -aw

item.title: detach, detach
item.description: silent flutterings of time connecting slowly but surely connecting with everything detaching from everything -aw

item.title: may my children
item.description: may my children understand their emotions, feel them never hear a raised decibel without explanation or apology -aw

item.title: found
item.description: never alone merely unfounded where you are you will be found -aw

item.title: every seasons colour
item.description: I’ve liked you in fall i’ve liked you in summer I think i’d like you in every seasons colour -aw

item.title: the humanity in us all
item.description: don’t betray your humanity put it down put everything down breathe in, breathe out you are only human there is no need to carry the weight of the world on your perfect shoulders -aw

item.title: jedi
item.description: the jedi were right don’t lose yourself in attachment for it only leads to suffering know your presence, know your worth be a giver without attaching -aw

item.title: tense
item.description: an unnoticable tenseness it creeps in silent but cunning deep breath relax the body take back the control and peace -aw

item.title: the world around us
item.description: the silent flutters the calm pitter pattering waves shake and branches creak the late day gold gleams and grows -aw

item.title: moments that dissipate
item.description: let go the moments dissipate quickly but only there can we exist forever -aw

item.title: how I wished
item.description: how I wished to be older when I was younger but how wrong I was learn to cherish where you’re at for one day you’ll look back and wish you were right here -aw

item.title: hauntingly
item.description: what drew you in closer what universe did I pull you away from weaving you into my orbit this cosmic entanglement an intergalactic opportunity hauntingly astonishing -aw

item.title: waiting, breathing
item.description: waiting, breathing the wind curses out your name a steadfast rock sitting atop the highest mountain top waiting, breathing -aw

item.title: have you?
item.description: have you ever felt the weight of a moment? the sting of a feeling? the sharp and dull of the everyday life don’t let it weigh on you accept the feelings that come be the riverbed that time flows through like water carving, changing, persevering -aw

item.title: the human condition
item.description: how innocent and fragile the human condition you remember my name if I remember yours? the time machine we live in a passage of cosmic proportions let’s take this ride together hold me close, don’t let go -aw

item.title: what it means to be human
item.description: the gravity of art, of creation allows us to tap into humanity tethering onto the very things that make us feel whole, and human -aw

item.title: polarity
item.description: seeking positivity avoiding negativity sometimes they are one in the same there is no one without the other -aw

item.title: are you looking?
item.description: are you looking? look to the sky, look to the moon when we’re both gazing upon the crescent above I just simply don’t feel so alone in this world -aw

item.title: seasons
item.description: be my four seasons consistent, cunning, always there from the summer we met until the winter when we got closer -aw

item.title: the teacher in you
item.description: teachers are a blessing sometimes we gain the best lessons from the things around us how nature teaches us to persevere how moments teach us how to let go how we teach ourselves how to exist within ourself sometimes the teacher is ourselves -aw

item.title: waiting for to bloom
item.description: letting time slip through my fingers but do I tell a rose when to bloom? some things take time in time all things blossom undeterred, in their own time or am I letting you slip through my fingers -aw

item.title: the power you keep
item.description: a single raindrop falls like a tear the single wreckless cloud that covers your sunny day what power do you give? what power do you keep? the power is in you -aw

item.title: so which is it
item.description: caught in between having all the time in the world and never having enough so which is it? do I have forever with you or shall I still cherish every moment? -aw

item.title: no matter the waves
item.description: like an boat on the wild sea you must take the gentle waves just as you take the ravaging ones for I once heard that a ship was not made to sit in a calm bay rather it was meant to be at sea, no matter the waves -aw

item.title: there is a way
item.description: vapid and unrelenting greed harshly burn our futures with unseeing eyes and cold hearts a path forward looks ever grim there is a way a way through the madness that ensues stop destroying, start enjoying freeing, liberating, succumbing -aw

item.title: pixels upon pixels
item.description: pixels upon pixels upon pixels dancing lights and parade of glass the touches of a screen yet I feel connected -aw

item.title: the light still shines
item.description: the dim light shines at the end of a tunnel a mirage, a blasphemous lie for the end may never be reached yet the light still shines as bright as a distant star always within sight but always out of reach -aw

item.title: entropy
item.description: two souls that just so happened to bump into one another what a strange and beautiful thing let the entropy unfold and begin anew -aw

item.title: this time, it's different
item.description: quick to forgive quick to forget but this time is different fight for what’s right stand up for others, be proud take what’s yours and leave the rest -aw

item.title: find your weird
item.description: find your weird and don’t let it go this is your soul, your spirit greeting you again and again perhaps it’s best if you share it -aw

item.title: let it all
item.description: let the flames flow let the waves crash let the wind blow harsh let it let it all -aw

item.title: the giver
item.description: i’m a giver I give not because I need to I give because I want to because my spirit insists a thing I can’t temper and don’t really wish to -aw

item.title: the start of beginning
item.description: the start of beginning an empire once started from one just like a revolution sometimes all it takes is just to move start, just start -aw

item.title: wave function collapse
item.description: wave function collapse but unlike a dying star it’s a controlled commitment out of all potential futures I unequivocally choose you to be my reality -aw

item.title: all those that bloomed
item.description: once you plant all the seeds only after time will you realize which roses are worth picking but it doesn’t stop you from appreciating all that bloomed with the same love, attention, appreciation -aw

item.title: idk what this is
item.description: like soaked stone in the sea with waves crashing in coming in and out of sight i don’t know what this is said the human so why should fright -aw

item.title: another soft landing
item.description: you’re more than meets the eye your grace and intelligence speak when vocal chords aren’t around your stare reverberates, richochets through the inner workings of my mind always landing softly, gently -aw

item.title: we know nothing
item.description: time ticks time waits for no one an otherworldly, alien concept we conjured this ourselves thinking we know what we created, understood we know nothing -aw

item.title: let love prevail
item.description: let love guide your path in a world without a sun there is considerable darkness little hope be a light for others share it, spread it love your neighbor let love prevail in the end -aw

item.title: without darkness
item.description: there is a future out there filled with love filled with light without darkness light would not be so clear, necessary -aw

item.title: what we call life
item.description: to be human is to crave order but to also learn, understand, grow but you eventually come to realize that chaos is the only thing that exists a transforming, transfiguring entropy this is what we call life -aw

item.title: limiting forms
item.description: a dream of desires but why do I desire feeling limited by this human form my spirit, my being and essence crave more than this existence something larger is at work -aw

item.title: lessons in disguise
item.description: an agony a pain these lessons in disguise why is this happening to me? no what is this teaching me? -aw

item.title: don't change
item.description: don’t change for me don’t change for anyone don’t change let the world see you the cost is far too high to fold like a bill -aw

item.title: facing the music
item.description: seeing all sides of both of us the faces we put on, and take off the stage and the behind the scenes hear the critics, face demons enjoying it all, together -aw

item.title: press to start
item.description: i don’t know what this is do we take the paths or do the paths take us spread out ahead of me possible futures dance like lit corridors deep breath in, deep breath out press to start -aw

item.title: blood red leaves
item.description: leaves blood red the disconcerting caw of a crow looming grey clouds rambling on and on wind sending chills upward along your spine fall, a time for finding comfort and warmth among the unsettling and resettling -aw

item.title: the hopeless optimist
item.description: what is being romantic if not hopelessly optimistic torturing ourselves within the pursuit of something bigger than we can even begin to comprehend -aw

item.title: growing
item.description: growth is but a thing of life spurts of failing, learning, living know that it is always better to grow than to be stagnant and withering -aw

item.title: fragments
item.description: nothing truly ever leaves you fragments exist a trove of delicate remains waiting to be rediscovered the memories, the care songs that had once been shared the love that was, made to last an unexpiring miracle within us all -aw

item.title: peaks within valleys within peaks
item.description: plans within plans within plans the peaks alongside the valleys of life the constant string of life pulling us along the universal timeline maybe we were wrong about time about seconds and money measuring worth instead of the unconditional love the intangibility that brings meaning and warmth worth it’s weight in imaginary gold -aw

item.title: this too
item.description: may you look at the clouds and remember that all things pass in time may you look at the last leaves of fall or the blades of grass upon the ground and remember that time cannot take all we are merely a creekbed time is the river flowing through us around us -aw

item.title: whimsical life
item.description: what kind of magic surrounds us the unseen, unheard, the unshakable feelings of whimsy and serendipity forces beyond our eyes that simply make what is, flourish and unfold -aw

item.title: pinholes
item.description: the words find us when we need them the most like the pinholes shining through the darkness that is night let them in, let them guide you your north star is already out there -aw

item.title: simply, be
item.description: be the mountain intricate, complex, unmoving changing slowly and surely allow yourself to exist and then simply be -aw

item.title: unpacking
item.description: there’s something beautiful about seeing someone’s baggage as more than an accompaniment as something to unpack and untangle together -aw

item.title: the journey
item.description: in an arduous journey there are peaks and valleys but you don’t get one without the other the universal trials of life we must all face to be human is to accept this but still retain hope -aw

item.title: comet
item.description: like a comet you burst into my life if only for a moment I caught a glimpse of unshakable beauty don’t leave so soon -aw

item.title: ever deserving
item.description: you deserve love like flowers deserve the rain and sunshine inevitable and unconditional it’s out there, as long as you accept it -aw

item.title: trust your wings
item.description: a bird lands on a branch not worrying about whether the branch will break for it trusts in its wings -aw

item.title: impermanence
item.description: nature is our constant reminder that nothing is permanent ever changing, growing, morphing what one was, will never be again grains of sand, death and rebirth green to brown to green again may you know that even if it’s believed to be the end it is simply a new beginning -aw

item.title: equilibrium
item.description: is it nourishing or drowning is it warming or disintegrating is it guiding or gusting is it grounding or limiting like elements, we have duality a balance to admire a natural equilibrium to adopt -aw

item.title: gifts we never asked for
item.description: gratitude is a blessing simple appreciation for what is rather than what ought to be a lived breath rather than an unsung breath a gift you never asked for but received delightfully anyways -aw

item.title: words
item.description: words words beautiful phonics stringing us along, day by day they come and go leaving and returning empowering, uplifting never to own but to hold and share -aw

item.title: the other shoe
item.description: I like who I can be around you coming out of my shell breaking down every last wall enjoying the passage of time there will never be another you so I guess that’s why i’m stuck waiting for the other shoe -aw

item.title: welcome to the weave
item.description: we are all just single threads in this giant weave of life alone we’re small, finding our way yet together we create purpose defining outcomes we have yet to imagine welcome to the weave -aw

item.title: falling apart
item.description: may fall be a reminder that it’s never too late to change to begin anew to let go of what was in order to make way for something entirely new -aw

item.title: nature of change
item.description: constant change, in flux, on the move we’re all just adjusting, living, trusting trusting that the universe will place us exactly where we need to be -aw

item.title: homebody
item.description: I don’t think I ever understood what being a homebody felt like until home felt like it could with you until home felt like it could be you nothing could compell me elsewhere -aw

item.title: roots upon roots
item.description: keep mind of where your feet are for presence is a present a gift we must all learn roots upon roots upon roots bound by the universe in all its elements manifest -aw

item.title: earmarked
item.description: you as a book the page-turner every page earmarked, highlighted, and footnotes scribbled in just so I could feel something just so I could help you write those unwritten chapters -aw

item.title: solitude
item.description: solitude my solitude what I’ve learned from you what I’ve learned of me It was never about them It was about me And how I care for them -aw

item.title: let it happen
item.description: may mysteries always lie just around each corner what I need, will come what seeks me, will find me -aw

item.title: a way with
item.description: I usually have a way with words but I saw you and -aw

item.title: are you listening?
item.description: some days you listen to the music some days you are the music it’s always been there but are you listening? -aw

item.title: the wanderers
item.description: we are not special we are mere wanderers of both space and time we create the special by finding someone else who enjoys the mundane just as much wandering, together -aw

item.title: the glass box
item.description: trees sway to and fro behind double panes I sit for what else can this world offer but marbled skies and an open field -aw

item.title: cosmic quandary
item.description: oh, I would have found you in different forms in different lifetimes across timelines, dimensions the shared energy and atoms cosmically inseparable -aw

item.title: beginnings are such delicate times
item.description: for all things preposterous and pronounced letting the wildest reaches of my imagination run rampant on an infinite digital canvas for once you’ve read, you cannot unread let each piece hit you where it must though I hope it soft these are my dreams, hopes, thoughts, joys for all time, always -aw
